remarks: Right cancellation law for vector addition.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvgcl.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvgcl.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvrcan $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G C ) = ( B G C ) <-> A = B ) ) $.
